    Get Started

    If you like the guide, please consider donating via PayPal.

    If you have any issues or problems, read the FAQ or ask on our Discord Server.

    Firstly, you’ll need to find out your PS Vita’s firmware version. You can find this by going to the Settings application and tapping System and then System Information. Your version should be displayed on the top of your screen.

    From To
    1.00 3.57 Updating to 3.60
    3.60 3.60 Installing HENkaku
    3.61 3.67 Blocking Updates
